field.name: psLoopPS
field.desc: Particle played at the tip while idle (not yet fired.)

field.name: fSpeed
field.desc: Speed at which rocket is fired

object.name: curveTensionSpeedFactorCurve
object.desc: Multiply the fire speed by the y value of the curve when the arrow is fired with this tension from the bow.

field.name: fGravity
field.desc: Gravity affecting the rocket when fired

field.name: fHipFireMaxDeviationAngle
field.desc: Max deviation angle(in degrees) when shooting from hip fire

field.name: fCrouchHipFireMaxDeviationAngle
field.desc: Max deviation angle(in degrees) when crouched and shooting from hip fire

field.name: fIronSightMaxDeviationAngle
field.desc: Max deviation angle(in degrees) when shooting from ironsight

field.name: fParticleEmitMultiplierForFullSpeed
field.desc: The rate of emission of the particles are multiplied by this proportional to the speed of the bow when the arrow is fired. max speed =< max emit rate.

field.name: fTime
field.desc: Delay from launch(in seconds) before rocket starts to fall

field.name: fGravity
field.desc: Gravity affecting rocket when it is falling

field.name: fMaxDistance
field.desc: Maximum distance(in meters) to travel before explosion

field.name: fMaxLifeTime
field.desc: Maximum life time(in seconds) before explosion. WARNING: Delay in the Explosive component also affects this!

field.name: arkPickupArchetype
field.desc: The name of the pickup archetype, replaces the particle arrow with this (rigid) after the first collision with something.

object.name: FlightStims
object.desc: Stims triggered each frame while the arrow is in flight

field.name: fRestitution
field.desc: [0-1] How much bounce is applied when deflecting off an object.

field.name: fArrowLength
field.desc: The length of the arrow in metres - used for penetration distances.
